import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './MoodConnection.css'; const MoodConnection = () => { const [selectedHabit, setSelectedHabit] = useState('sleep'); const [selectedTimeframe, setSelectedTimeframe] = useState('week'); const habits = [ { id: 'sleep', name: 'Sleep Quality', icon: 'ðŸ˜´', color: '#6366f1' }, { id: 'exercise', name: 'Exercise', icon: 'ðŸ’ª', color: '#10b981' }, { id: 'meditation', name: 'Meditation', icon: 'ðŸ§˜', color: '#8b5cf6' }, { id: 'nutrition', name: 'Healthy Eating', icon: 'ðŸ¥—', color: '#f59e0b' }, { id: 'social', name: 'Social Time', icon: 'ðŸ‘¥', color: '#ef4444' }, { id: 'learning', name: 'Learning', icon: 'ðŸ“š', color: '#06b6d4' } ]; const moodData = { sleep: { week: [ { day: 'Mon', habit: 8, mood: 7, energy: 6 }, { day: 'Tue', habit: 7, mood: 6, energy: 5 }, { day: 'Wed', habit: 9, mood: 8, energy: 7 }, { day: 'Thu', habit: 8, mood: 7, energy: 6 }, { day: 'Fri', habit: 6, mood: 5, energy: 4 }, { day: 'Sat', habit: 9, mood: 8, energy: 7 }, { day: 'Sun', habit: 8, mood: 7, energy: 6 } ], month: [ { week: 'Week 1', habit: 7.5, mood: 6.5, energy: 5.8 }, { week: 'Week 2', habit: 8.2, mood: 7.2, energy: 6.3 }, { week: 'Week 3', habit: 7.8, mood: 6.8, energy: 6.0 }, { week: 'Week 4', habit: 8.5, mood: 7.5, energy: 6.7 } ] }, exercise: { week: [ { day: 'Mon', habit: 8, mood: 8, energy: 8 }, { day: 'Tue', habit: 0, mood: 5, energy: 4 }, { day: 'Wed', habit: 9, mood: 9, energy: 9 }, { day: 'Thu', habit: 7, mood: 7, energy: 7 }, { day: 'Fri', habit: 8, mood: 8, energy: 8 }, { day: 'Sat', habit: 0, mood: 6, energy: 5 }, { day: 'Sun', habit: 8, mood: 8, energy: 8 } ], month: [ { week: 'Week 1', habit: 6.8, mood: 7.2, energy: 6.9 }, { week: 'Week 2', habit: 7.5, mood: 7.8, energy: 7.4 }, { week: 'Week 3', habit: 8.0, mood: 8.2, energy: 8.0 }, { week: 'Week 4', habit: 7.2, mood: 7.5, energy: 7.2 } ] } }; const insights = [ { icon: 'ðŸ˜´', title: 'Sleep Well = Happier Mornings', description: 'Users who sleep 8+ hours report 23% higher morning mood scores', correlation: '+0.78', color: '#6366f1' }, { icon: 'ðŸ’ª', title: 'Exercise = Boosted Energy', description: 'Regular exercise correlates with 31% higher energy levels throughout the day', correlation: '+0.82', color: '#10b981' }, { icon: 'ðŸ§˜', title: 'Meditation = Calmer Mindset', description: 'Daily meditation reduces stress indicators by 45% and improves focus', correlation: '+0.71', color: '#8b5cf6' }, { icon: 'ðŸ¥—', title: 'Healthy Eating = Better Mood', description: 'Nutritious meals lead to 28% improvement in afternoon energy and mood', correlation: '+0.65', color: '#f59e0b' } ]; const benefits = [ 'Discover which habits have the biggest impact on your mood and energy', 'Identify patterns that help you optimize your daily routine', 'Track correlations between habits and emotional well-being', 'Make data-driven decisions about which habits to prioritize', 'Understand how lifestyle changes affect your mental health', 'Build a personalized habit plan based on your unique patterns' ]; const currentData = moodData[selectedHabit]?.[selectedTimeframe] || moodData.sleep.week; return (

); }; export default MoodConnection;
